needle_text: Memory consolidation during sleep helps learners retain verbal information better than visual patterns in most cases.
question_text: Your dad's brain favoring podcasts over football when shutting down for the night can be explained by the **modality effect**. Memory recall is higher for information received via speech (like podcasts) than through writing (which could be analogous to the visual patterns of football).

needle_text: User adoption of complex technological systems often depends on establishing initial trust through consistent performance and transparent operational feedback mechanisms
question_text: The "secret sauce" for getting people to accept a new, complicated tool is to make it seem simple and straightforward.
